==Sports and Recreation==
==Sports and Recreation==
â
[[File:Jigrr.png|thumb|right|160px|Jigrr, the official mascot of the [[2008 Commonwealth Youth Games]]]]
 
Popular games and sports in Pune include [[track and field athletics|athletics]], [[cricket]], [[basketball]], [[badminton]], [[field hockey]], [[soccer]], [[tennis]], [[kabaddi]], [[kho-kho]], [[Rowing (sport)|rowing]] and [[chess]]. The [[Pune International Marathon]] is an annual [[marathon]] conducted in Pune. The [[2008 Commonwealth Youth Games]] were held in Pune.
Popular games and sports in Pune include [[track and field athletics|athletics]], [[cricket]], [[basketball]], [[badminton]], [[field hockey]], [[soccer]], [[tennis]], [[kabaddi]], [[kho-kho]], [[Rowing (sport)|rowing]] and [[chess]]. The [[Pune International Marathon]] is an annual [[marathon]] conducted in Pune. The [[2008 Commonwealth Youth Games]] were held in Pune.
